All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddCardFragment
Fragment for adding a new card to the user's account
AppUtils
The type App utils.
BankCard
BankCard class is a model class that represents a bank card.
BankingFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
BankTransaction
Represents a bank transaction.
BaseLocalEntityDao<T extends com.pinomo.dolmabank.database.LocalPayloadEntity>
Interface for the local database operations
CardBodyItem
CardBodyItem is a subclass of CardsRecyclerViewItem that represents the body of a card.
CardsRecyclerAdapter
Adapter for the cards recycler view
CardsRecyclerViewItem
Represents an item in the cards recycler view.
CryptoFunction<T>
The type Crypto function.
CryptoFunctionTester
The type Crypto function tester.
CryptoUtils
CryptoUtils is a utility class that provides a static interface to the currently loaded CryptoFunction
CustomArrayAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for the Spinner in the MainActivity
DolmaBankApp
Application class for DolmaBank
DolmaBankDatabase
DolmaBankDatabase is the main database (abstract) class that extends RoomDatabase.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
HomescreenFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
InvalidKeyException
The type Invalid key exception.
LanguageUtils
The type Language utils.
LoadingFragment
Fragment that displays a loading animation.
LocalBankCard
LocalBankCard is a class that represents a bank card in the local database.
LocalBankCardDao
Data Access Object for LocalBankCard entity
LocalBankTransaction
LocalBankTransaction is a class that represents a bank transaction in the local database.
LocalBankTransactionDao
The interface Local bank transaction dao.
LocalUser
The type Local user.
LocalUserContact
The type Local user contact.
LocalUserContactDao
The interface Local user contact dao.
LocalUserDao
The interface Local user dao.
MainActivity
Main activity of the app.
MarginItemDecoration
This class is used to add margin to the bottom of the items in the RecyclerView.
MonoalphabeticFunction
The type Monoalphabetic function.
NoCryptoFunction
The type No crypto function.

The type Payload entity operations.

Fragment for the profile page

Fragment for registering a new user
RegisterLandingFragment
First fragment that the user sees when they open the app.
User
User entity class Must be 18 years old or older to be able to register.
UserContact
Represents a contact's information.
VigenereFunction
The type Vigenere function.
